This is a course website for PSYC 573 in the 2024 Fall semester. You will find the syllabus, lecture slides, and course notes in the navigation bar in the top right corner. Homework submission will be through [Brightspace](https://brightspace.usc.edu).

::: {.callout-tip}
## Guide to navigate the course

* [Syllabus](/syllabus/index.qmd), [modules and slides](/modules.qmd), [course notes](/docs/index.html)
* Homework instruction and submission: [Brightspace](https://blackboard.usc.edu)
* Course announcement, additional readings: [Slack](https://usc.enterprise.slack.com/)
* Q & A: [Slack](https://usc.enterprise.slack.com/)
:::
